Context:
Our partners can access new technologies, state-of-the-art equipment and facilities, and college-wide expertise for a lower cost than building an in-house R&D department. They tap into a wide range of research capabilities and resources to solve research challenges. The partnership involves faculty and students in investigative roles.

Contact Information:
- Website: Visit Research & Innovation

- Social Media Hub: Visit Our Social Media Hub

Additional Information:
